revision.text: ==Central Nahuatl== ===Noun=== {{nhn-noun|i}} # [[grapes|Grapes]]. [[Category:Amecameca Central Nahuatl]] {{c|nhn|Fruits}} ---- ==Classical Nahuatl== ===Pronunciation=== {{rfp|nci}} ===Noun=== {{head|nci|nouns}} # [[grapes]] #* '''1555''', [[w:Alonso de Molina|Alonso de Molina]], ''Aqui comien√ßa vn vocabulario enla lengua Castellana y Mexicana'' #*: Vid parra o cepa. xocomecatl. ===References=== * Karttunen, Frances. (1983) ''An Analytical Dictionary of Nahuatl'', University of Texas Press. [[Category:nci:Fruits]]
